mapper.insert: insert into work_wash (ww_id, work_wash_no, wpo_no, reservation_order_no, receive_date, consultant_by, group_leader, supervisor_by, wash_type, car_id, status, coupon_code, pay_total, pay_way, pay_status, tip_total, from_type, linkman, linkman_mobile, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, wash_cost, car_no, customer_id) values (#{wwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workWashNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consultantBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{washType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tipTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkmanMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{washCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update work_wash set work_wash_no = #{workWashNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wpo_no = #{wpoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reservation_order_no = #{reservationOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_date = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consultant_by = #{consultantBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_leader = #{groupLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supervisor_by = #{supervisorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wash_type = #{washType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_code = #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_total = #{payTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tip_total = #{tipTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, from_type = #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman_mobile = #{linkmanMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wash_cost = #{washCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ww_id = #{wwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update work_wash set pay_total = #{payTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_way = #{payWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_status = 1 where work_wash_no = #{workWashNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ww_id, work_wash_no, wpo_no, reservation_order_no, receive_date, consultant_by, group_leader, supervisor_by, wash_type, car_id, status, coupon_code, pay_total, pay_way, pay_status, tip_total, from_type, linkman, linkman_mobile, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, wash_cost, car_no, customer_id from work_wash where ww_id = #{wwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ww_id, work_wash_no, wpo_no, reservation_order_no, receive_date, consultant_by, group_leader, supervisor_by, wash_type, car_id, status, coupon_code, pay_total, pay_way, pay_status, tip_total, from_type, linkman, linkman_mobile, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, wash_cost, car_no, customer_id from work_wash where work_wash_no = #{wwNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ww_id, work_wash_no, wpo_no, reservation_order_no, receive_date, consultant_by, group_leader, supervisor_by, wash_type, car_id, status, coupon_code, pay_total, pay_way, pay_status, tip_total, from_type, linkman, linkman_mobile, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, wash_cost, car_no, customer_id from work_wash where wpo_no = #{wpoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ww_id, work_wash_no, wpo_no, reservation_order_no, receive_date, consultant_by, group_leader, supervisor_by, wash_type, car_id, status, coupon_code, pay_total, pay_way, pay_status, tip_total, from_type, linkman, linkman_mobile, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, wash_cost, car_no, customer_id from work_wash

select ww_id, work_wash_no, wpo_no, reservation_order_no, receive_date, consultant_by, group_leader, supervisor_by, wash_type, car_id, status, coupon_code, pay_total, pay_way, pay_status, tip_total, from_type, linkman, linkman_mobile, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, wash_cost, car_no, customer_id from work_wash where car_no = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and group_leader = #{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (status < 7 or status > 7)

SELECT ww.ww_id AS wwId, ww.work_wash_no AS washNo, ww.receive_date AS receiveDate, b.realname AS consultantName, bu.realname AS groupLeader, buu.realname AS supervisorName, ww.wash_type AS washType, ww.status AS status, ww.pay_total AS payTotal, ww.pay_way AS payWay, ww.pay_status AS payStatus, ww.tip_total AS tipTotal, ww.linkman AS linkman, ww.linkman_mobile AS linkmanMobile, ww.description AS description, ww.create_date AS createDate, ww.wash_cost AS washCost, ww.car_no AS carNo, ww.customer_id AS customerId, cu.realname AS customerName, cu.mobile AS mobile FROM work_wash ww LEFT JOIN customer_info cu ON ww.customer_id = cu.c_id LEFT JOIN base_user b ON ww.consultant_by = b.user_id LEFT JOIN base_user bu ON ww.group_leader = bu.user_id LEFT JOIN base_user buu ON ww.supervisor_by = buu.user_id WHERE ww.ww_id = #{wwId}
